#summary What are the types of participants to the SVG-edit community

The goal of this page is for everyone in the community to be aware of how different community members use and rely on SVG-edit


= FOSS Web apps = 
  * All Wiki engines
  * Drupal
  * E-learning tools
  * etc.


= Online services with drawing needs =
  * Drawings for products
  * T-shirts like http://instanttee.co.nr/


= Installable application =

Integrating SVG-edit in a desktop application, which you download and use on your computer, like http://bluegriffon.org/
